Refactor: Modernize Wallet UI, introduce composable components, and enhance navigation
This commit introduces a major user interface overhaul for the main wallet screen, replacing the previous design with a modern, "glassmorphic" aesthetic. It modularizes UI elements into reusable Jetpack Compose components and refactors navigation to be type-safe.
**UI/UX Overhaul (Jetpack Compose)** * **New `DecagonWalletScreen`:** Implemented a completely new wallet screen with a modern, gradient-based UI. It features a vertical scroll layout with distinct sections for the top bar, balance hero, portfolio chart, and quick actions. * **`FloatingTopBar` Component:** Created a new top bar component that includes a wallet switcher trigger (profile icon), a `NetworkPillBadge`, and a notifications icon. * **`BalanceHeroSection` Component:** Implemented a central display for the wallet balance, fiat value, and a copyable truncated address. * **`DecagonQuickActionsBar`:** Redesigned the quick actions (Send, Receive, Buy, Swap) into a floating bar with updated styling. It now disables "Send" and "Swap" for view-only wallets. * **`PortfolioPerformanceChart`:** Added a new, animated line chart to visualize portfolio history, complete with a `TimeRangeSelector` (1D, 1W, 1M, 1Y, ALL). * **Modal & Sheet Redesign:** * `DecagonSendSheet`, `DecagonReceiveSheet`, and `TokenSelectorSheet` have been restyled with a consistent dark, transparent background, updated fields, and improved button aesthetics. * Introduced `WalletSwitcherModal` and `NetworkSelectorModal` for improved wallet and network management directly from the main screen.
**Navigation & Architecture** * **Type-Safe Navigation (`DecagonRoute`):** Introduced a sealed interface `DecagonRoute` with `kotlinx.serialization` to replace string-based navigation routes, making navigation more robust and less error-prone. * **Refactored `DecagonNavGraph`:** Updated the navigation graph to use the new type-safe `DecagonRoute` objects for all destinations. * **Startup Logic:** `MainActivity` now uses `produceState` to determine the initial route (`Onboarding` or `Portfolio`) based on whether a wallet exists, simplifying the startup flow.
**Domain & Data** * **Extended Data Models:** Added `isViewOnly` to `DecagonWallet` and `logoUrl`, `valueUsd`, and `change24h` to `TokenBalance`. * **New Entities:** Added `PortfolioHistoryEntity` and `NotificationEntity` to the local database schema to support future features.
**Legacy & Code Cleanup** * **Deleted `DecagonSendSheet`:** The old send sheet was removed and replaced with a redesigned version in the `components` package. * **Removed Unused IDE files:** Deleted `.idea/.gitignore` and `.idea/inspectionProfiles/Project_Default.xml`. * Removed commented-out Firebase dependencies from `gradle/libs.versions.toml`.

Refactor: Optimize DiscoverRepository and remove legacy UI
This commit refactors the `DiscoverRepository` for improved performance and reliability, and removes legacy `Decagon` UI components that have been deprecated.
**Architecture & Data Layer** * **DiscoverRepository Refactor**: * Implement refresh logic that only fetches data if the cache is empty or stale, reducing unnecessary network calls. * Optimize data fetching by running API calls in parallel using `coroutineScope` and `async`. * Remove the `TokenLogoResolver`, now directly using logo URLs provided by the CoinGecko and DeFiLlama APIs. * Make `logoUrl` nullable in `PerpEntity` to handle cases where a logo is not available, preventing crashes. * Add `getXCount()` methods to `DiscoverDao` to efficiently check if tables are empty. * Simplify logging and remove verbose output for cleaner debugging. * **Koin/DI Cleanup**: * Remove `TokenLogoResolver` from dependency injection in `decagonCoreModule` and `repositoryModule`. * Move `SessionManager` and `SessionViewModel` DI setup into `decagonCoreModule` for better organization. * **API Service**: * Remove the unused `getSimplePrices` endpoint from `CoinGeckoApiService`.
**UI & Code Cleanup** * **Legacy UI Removal**: * Delete the entire legacy `com.decagon.ui` package, including `DecagonNavGraph`, `DecagonBottomNavBar`, and associated routes. * Remove `KoinCryptoAppMainActivity`, which was part of the old structure. * **Package & Import Fixes**: * Correct package names from `com.octane.wallet.*` to `com.wallet.*` in multiple files, including `DiscoverRepositoryImpl`, `DiscoverDao`, and various ViewModels. * Update import paths to reflect the corrected package structure.

Refactor Discover data fetching and add "View All" screens
**Architecture & Data Layer** * Refactor `DiscoverRepositoryImpl` to distinguish between limited (top 10) and unlimited data fetching for Tokens, Perps, and DApps. * Existing methods like `observeTokens()` are now optimized to fetch only 10 items for the main Discover screen's performance. * New methods (`observeAllTokens()`, `observeAllPerps()`, `observeAllDApps()`) are added to fetch the complete lists for dedicated "View All" screens. * Remove the slow, API-based `TokenLogoResolver` and rely directly on logos provided by the CoinGecko and DeFiLlama APIs. * Add `PerpLogoProvider`, a new service that uses a hardcoded map to provide instant logo resolution for perpetual futures contracts, eliminating network latency. * Update the `DriftContractDto.toEntity()` mapper to use the new `PerpLogoProvider` for instantaneous logo lookups.
**UI (Jetpack Compose)** * Implement `AllTokensScreen`, a new screen that displays a searchable, full list of all available tokens without a 10-item limit. * Create `AllTokensViewModel` and `ObserveAllTokensUseCase` to support the new unlimited token list screen. * Update `DiscoverScreen` to use the new limited-data repository methods (`.take(10)`), ensuring faster initial load times for its tabs. * Add placeholders for navigation from the Discover screen to the new "View All" screens for tokens, perps, and dApps.
**Code Quality & Fixes** * Corrected package names in import statements across multiple repository implementations (`AssetRepositoryImpl`, `TransactionRepositoryImpl`, etc.) to resolve build issues.
